title: How to download restricted backup config file on HG8245H router

comments.text: Hello, I have the same problem with this router: I would need to get a configuration file. Did you solve it somehow? I bought new unlocked HG8245H router for experiments. I can send you content of cfgfileroot.asp. Please contact me.

Hi @Mato I was able to get 
cfgfileroot.asp
but could not dump config file it does not want to dump it even when I click on backup button

Hi @Vido thanks for reply. It is a big pity. Have you any other idea? I see your other question reverseengineering.stackexchange.com/questions/26837/â€¦ is the right way? Can I help you with something with full access to unlocked HG8245H? Thanks.
@Mato sorry I dont have any idea
:-( I found this github.com/logon84/Hacking_Huawei_HG8012H_ONT yet. It seems interesting, what do you think?
